history.content:
It really depends on how confident you are about being able to declare. If you're confident that you'll meet the GPA cap, then I'd Phase I CS188, as it's going to be pretty hard to get in during Phase II. However, if you don't meet the cap and Phase I CS188, you will be kicked off of the waitlist after we process all major applications - effectively wasting your Phase I units. 

So if you're pretty sure you can declare, I'd Phase I EE16A and CS188, if not then Phase I EE16A and CS61C

I've currently enrolled in CS61C and waitlisted for EE16a (I'm a rising LSCS sophomore, recently submitted declaration form). I don't know how long it will be for declarations to be processed, but I've heard that I might not get CS188 if I try to enroll in phase 2. Should I waitlist for CS188 instead of 16a or CS61C? I've heard the same for both of those. 

I would really appreciate advice on which classes I should phase 1. Thanks!
history.subject: EE16a vs CS61c vs CS188 for phase 1
